about_the_game: Slaughter thousands of creatures from beyond, battle insane bosses and try to survive on your way to the unknown! Fractured Fury is a game that offers a unique twist on the bullet hell / bullet heaven genre, as it allows players to aim their primary weapons instead of auto-firing. Featuring an extensive and quirky crafting system, boss battles, story/progression and tongue-in-cheek 1980s humor. In Fractured Fury, players will battle their way through challenging levels, encountering a wide variety of enemies and obstacles along the way in this 1980s Apocalyptic world! Did we mention there's a squirrel-in-a-back-pack-turret weapon?
